artifacts.summary: Analysis of two remaining sorries in Representation.lean: box forward sorry is a genuine semantic gap (cannot eliminate without changing definitions, does not affect completeness theorems); BMCS existence sorry is constructively resolvable via existing sorry-free SaturatedConstruction in Boneyard combined with a temporally-saturated Lindenbaum lemma

partial_progress.details: Research report created with full analysis of both sorries, dependency graph, and 4-phase implementation plan for sorry elimination
